```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Make sure to run "install.packages("renv")" in the console, and then run "renv::restore()" to retrieve the packages needed to run these markdown files.

```{r}
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```


## R Markdown

Tidycensus variables to remember:

Total population
B02001_001 (or B01003_001)
White population
B02001_002
Black population
B02001_003
Asian population
B02001_005
American Indian and Alaska Native population
B02001_004
Native Hawaiian or other pacific islander population
B02001_006
Latino population
B03002_012
